title: (4348) Brand New House for Sale, Piliyandala Miriswatha
details: Brand New House for Sale, Piliyandala Miriswatha, 800m from Piliyandala Junction / Cargills food City, 5 Minutes Drive to Piliyandala Town Architect Designed, Ground Floor- 01 Bed Room, Toilet / Bath room, Living Dining , Pantry and Maids Room, Fist Floor- 3 Bed Room, Bath Room , 1 Large Balconies Rs : 178 Lacks (Negotiable) 17.8 Million
